title: Oil review. No. 04
creator_credit: Greenpark Productions and Film Producers Guild
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. Transfer by road: a story of the moving of a giant new fractionating column from the workshop in which it was made to Grangemouth Refinery, in England. 2. Something small: a story of oil helping Danish farmers to produce more eggs. 3. Made to order: new glass apparatus for the Research Station at Sunbuyry (England) is made on the premises.
